Subject: Job Offer - Machine Learning Infrastructure Engineer

Dear [Recruiter Name],

Thank you so much for offering me the Machine Learning Infrastructure Engineer position at [Company Name]. I truly appreciate you taking the time to speak with me and walk me through the opportunity. I enjoyed learning more about [Company Name]'s work in [mention specific area], and I'm excited about the potential to contribute to your team.

After careful consideration, I'm writing to discuss the compensation. While I am very interested in the role, the base salary of $145,000 is lower than I was expecting based on my experience and industry research. Similar roles at [Company Name], based on my research, appear to be compensated in the range of $155,000-$170,000.

I also have another offer for a similar role at $160,000.

I am very enthusiastic about the opportunity at [Company Name]. Would you be open to discussing a salary adjustment to bring the offer closer to my expectations and the competitive landscape?

Thank you again for your time and consideration. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Sincerely,

Emily Chen
